archimate:TechnologyService.name: AzureCognitiveServices
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Cognitive Services A comprehensive family of AI services and cognitive APIs to help you build intelligent apps https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/cognitive-services/
Free account What is Azure Cognitive Services? Cognitive Services bring AI within reach of every developerâ€”without requiring machine-learning expertise. All it takes is an API call to embed the ability to see, hear, speak, search, understand, and accelerate decision-making into your apps.
Watch this 50-second video to see how you can deploy AI for various use-cases, using the programming languages you already know.
Explore the benefits of Cognitive Services Apply AI to more scenarios with the most comprehensive portfolio of domain-specific AI capabilities on the market
Build confidently with the first AI services to achieve human parity in computer vision, speech, and language
Deploy Cognitive Services anywhere from the cloud to the edge with containers
No machine-learning expertise required
Azure Cognitive Services Decision Language Speech Vision Web search Make smarter decisions faster
Anomaly Detector PREVIEW Identify potential problems early on.
Content Moderator Detect potentially offensive or unwanted content.
Personalizer Create rich, personalized experiences for every user.
